note.p: Career: Entered the Royal Navy; accompanied William Pitt Amherst's embassy to China (1816-1817); visited Napoleon on St Helena (1817?); served on the west coast of America; visited the Galapagos Islands and took pendulum observations; retired from the Navy and devoted his time to travel and science; died insane
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1844 No 60 pp 526-527
